words.source: H6680 Piel wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'And Pharaoh charged', ESV 'Then Pharaoh commanded', NASB 'Then Pharaoh commanded' — ESV/NASB agree; KJV uses 'charged'
H3605 prep + noun masc sg cstr; KJV 'all', ESV 'all', NASB 'all' — all agree
H5971 noun masc sg cstr + 3ms suffix; KJV 'all his people', ESV 'all his people', NASB 'all his people' — all agree
H559 prep + Qal inf cstr; KJV 'saying', ESV (restructures), NASB 'saying' — KJV/NASB agree
H3605 noun masc sg cstr; KJV 'Every', ESV 'Every', NASB 'Every' — all agree
H1121 article + noun masc sg abs; KJV 'son', ESV 'son', NASB 'son' — all agree
H3209 article + Qal passive participle masc sg abs; KJV 'that is born', ESV 'born', NASB 'who is born' — all agree
H2975 article + proper noun + directional he; KJV 'into the river', ESV 'into the Nile', NASB 'into the Nile' — ESV/NASB agree; KJV uses generic 'river'
H7993 Hiphil impf 2mp + 3ms suffix; KJV 'ye shall cast', ESV 'you shall cast', NASB 'you must throw' — all agree
H3605 conj + noun masc sg cstr; KJV 'and every', ESV 'but every', NASB 'but every' — ESV/NASB add adversative 'but'
H1323 article + noun fem sg abs; KJV 'daughter', ESV 'daughter', NASB 'daughter' — all agree
H2421 Piel impf 2mp + paragogic nun; KJV 'ye shall save alive', ESV 'you shall let live', NASB 'you shall let live' — ESV/NASB agree; KJV uses 'save alive'
